item.title: ‘Twinless’ Star Dylan O’Brien Explains How the Best-Reviewed Movie of His Career Began with the Entire Town Saying No
item.description: The actor considers the film a success story in an IP-obssessed Hollywood: “we get to show people that you can trust an audience a little more than these financiers or executives might think.”

item.title: Dylan O’Brien Says It “Sucked” When Sex Scenes From ‘Twinless’ Were Leaked Online: “Stop Doing That, It Affects Us”
